T.F.D.A approved dietary supplement.

name: Powerherbz Balm
description: Powerherbz Balm made from natural herbs for the relief of muscle and body pain, itching, insect bites, headache, migraine and more. A wonderful balm for well being. The balm ointment contains barleria lupulina, zingiber oil, clove oil, eucalyptus, borneol campher, mentholatum. For external use only. Don’t rub into your eyes and keep away from the reach of children. Barleria Lupulina: Is especially used to relax the muscles and to relief pain and has also psychopharmalogical activities. Zingiber Oil: Nausea & vomiting prevention by travelling, stomach flu. Clove Oil: The health benefits of clove oil can be attributed to its antimicrobial, antifungal, antiseptic, antiviral, aphrodisiac and stimulating properties. The oil is used for treating a variety of health disorders including toothaches, indigestion, cough, asthma, headache, stress. Clove oil is rich in minerals such as calcium, hydrochloric acid, iron, phosphorus, sodium, potassium, and vitamin A and vitamin C. Borneol Camphor: A long history of use in Eastern medicine for treatment of convulsions due to high fever, cholera, pneumonia. It's been used externally for pain relief, rheumatism, abscesses, boils, cold sores, sore throat, chest infections and chest infections, etc. Mentholatum: Is a topical analgesic.
